snippet: As a boy, Ray Knox helped a neighbor with household chores and often washed her 1966 Cadillac Fleetwood. After the woman died in 1976, he inherited the car.
abstract: Ray Knox of Greenwich, Conn, owns 1966 Cadillac Fleetwood Sixty Special that once belonged to neighbor he used to help with household chores when he was a boy; neighbor's daughter gave car to Knox after her mother passed away.
lead_paragraph: As a boy, Ray Knox helped a neighbor with household chores and often washed her 1966 Cadillac Fleetwood. After the woman died in 1976, he inherited the car.

headline.seo: Bequest to the Boy Next Door
